filename: Addendum 1 RFP JA-207652 Student and Staff Computing Devices.pdf

data.Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
data.Bid Submission Type: Electronic or manual; supporting docs as attachments for limited space
data.Term of Bid: 3 years initial with two 1-year extensions (max 5 years)
data.Pre Bid Meeting: References contacted week after due date
data.Installation: Etching only on laptops (not monitors/AIO); no securing desktops; coordinate schedule with ED TECH dept
data.Delivery Date: Starting September 2024; meet agreed deadlines; no vendor inventory stocking required
data.Any Additional Documentation Required: Additional warranty pricing as attachments; Form 1295 with RFP; references not limited to DFW area
data.MFG for Registration: All warranties by OEM; no insurance underwriting
data.Model_no: Proposed make/model in pricing table; autopilot for Windows, Google Management for Chromebooks
data.Product: Computing devices with OEM warranties; no ADP for student devices; webcams required for AIO desktops
data.Bid Summary: Responses to 39 vendor questions: USB 3.1 min for monitors (higher OK); award at August board; no submission deadline extension; quantities over contract life; Microsoft VLA yes
data.Product Specification: 1yr warranty min for Chromebooks, 3yr for Windows laptops; no local location required; hot swap only for >5 day warranty repairs; samples for large purchases only; 65W chargers min for Chromebooks

filename: Addendum 2 RFP JA-207652 Student and Staff Computing Devices.pdf
JA-207652 Student and Staff Computing Devices FINAL.pdf

data.Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
data.Bid Submission Type: Electronic via iSupplier portal or manual sealed envelope to Procurement Services
data.Term of Bid: 3-year initial term with two (2) successive one (1) year extensions, not to exceed five (5) years total
data.Pre Bid Meeting: 10-JUN-2024 14:00:00 CST via Microsoft Teams (Meeting ID: 270 031 467 036, Passcode: N9ndKY)
data.Installation: White glove services required: asset decaling, asset reporting, etching (laptops only), delivery to varied locations
data.Delivery Date: Quantities spread over life of contract; anticipated quotes starting September 2024
data.Any Additional Documentation Required: Form 1295 (Certificate of Interested Parties), MWBE forms, W9, 3 references, factory-authorized certifications for resellers, warranty details as attachments
data.MFG for Registration: OEM warranties required; no specific manufacturer registration mentioned
data.Contract or Cooperative to use: Dallas ISD Procurement Services; potential EPCNT and CTPA interlocal agreements
data.Model_no: Minimum specs: e.g., Tier 1 Chromebook (Intel Celeron N100, 11.6" touch, 8GB DDR5, 64GB eMMC); Tier 3 Student Laptop (Intel i5 13th Gen, 13" non-touch, 16GB DDR5, 256GB NVMe SSD)
data.Product: Student and staff computing devices: Chromebooks, Windows laptops, tablets, desktops, monitors, and accessories (sleeves, cases, mice, keyboards)
data.contact_info: Buyer: Jasmine Alzate, JALZATE@dallasisd.org, Phone: (972) 925-4100; Procurement Services: 9400 N Central Expwy, Ste 1510, Dallas, TX 75231
data.Bid Summary: RFP for supplying computing devices meeting minimum specs over 5 years; estimates: 50,000 Chromebooks, 5,000 student laptops, 50,000 tablets, 10,000 staff laptops, 5,000 desktops, 5,000 monitors; multiple vendors possible; competitive quotes per purchase
data.Product Specification: Detailed minimums: Student Chromebook Tier 1 (11.6" touch, Intel Celeron N100, 8GB RAM, 64GB eMMC, 10hr battery, WiFi-6E, 1yr warranty); Student Laptop Tier 3 (13" non-touch, Intel i5 13th Gen, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, Windows 11 Pro, 3yr warranty); Staff Desktop Tier 1 (Intel i5 14th Gen, 23.8" touch, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Windows 11 Pro, 3yr warranty); similar for tablets/monitors

filename: Student and Staff Computing Devices __SOURCING #168884__ - Bid Information - {3} _ BidNet Direct.html

data.Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
data.Product: Student and staff computing devices: laptops, desktops, tablets, display monitors
data.Bid Summary: RFP for computing devices; specs include minimum hardware for tiers; quantities estimates over 5 years; multiple vendors possible; accessories bundled
data.Product Specification: Enterprise management ready; various tiers for Chromebooks, Windows laptops, tablets, desktops, monitors; detailed specs in full RFP document
